{{obsolete}} {{item |itemtype=Comestible |name=Apple |cost=11 |weight=2 }} {{flavour|A delicious, firm red fruit, tart to the tongue. ---- "MINERVA was the goddess of wisdom, but on one occasion she did a very foolish thing; she entered into competition with Juno and Venus for the prize of beauty. It happened thus: At the nuptials of Peleus and Thetis all the gods were invited with the exception of Eris, or Discord. Enraged at her exclusion, the goddess threw a golden apple among the guests, with the inscription, 'For the fairest.'" -Bullfinch's Mythology, Chap.
